thread.title: Nina Dauphinais
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Nina Dauphinais

author: Nina Dauphinais
title: Nina Dauphinais
text: We started the day looking for a new recliner rocker but happened into a sale day, the saleswomen Amy, showed us the many offerings and was very knowledgeable and easy to talk with, we purchased our recliner and the matching couch, It arrived the day and time promised. The delivery men were very careful and setup was a snap. No problems. We will be coming back and recommend the Gardner-White at 14 mile near Ryan for your furniture needs
